title: Fabio Jakobsen Is on a Mission: ‘It’s up to Me to Show That Winning Is Possible Here’
content:
Jakobsen had an understated 2024 but is determined to get back on track this year. So how is he approaching that target?

Read the full article at Fabio Jakobsen Is on a Mission: ‘It’s up to Me to Show That Winning Is Possible Here’ on Velo.
author: sstokes
